data.text: Nyasaye osekawo kare e dier chokruok maduongʼ,
Nyaka karangʼo ma ubiro dhi nyime ka udewo wangʼ joma ok timbegi nikare
Ngʼaduru bura makare ne joma ok nyal kod nyithi kiye,
Resuru joma ok nyal kod joma ochando;
To gisesiko ka gimemore kendo onge gima gingʼeyo.
To ubiro tho ka ji ajia;
Aa malo, yaye Nyasaye, ngʼadni piny bura,
